title: PSI Oliver
description: An address to reckon with at Belathur Main Road, Seegehalli, just off Old Madras Road and with a strong foundation of trust, this is a well researched project. The team behind the scenes is a very talented and well experienced one. The benchmark given to the team was to ensure that you open doors to a new and evolved lifestyle and set standards to reckon with, in the vicinity. Every detail has been finalised by the top management after a meticulous thought process and keeping in mind the obligation and responsibility of the company towards its customers. With amenities that meet international standards and a price tag which is friendly on your wallet, Hilife Horizon is all set to surpass all conventional norms of residential apartments.
